hero.title: Don't miss any
hero.subtitle: Discover and organize events, manage your crew and show the world your garage, because life is too short not to know where the best events are...

features.title: Main Features
features.subtitle: All the features that will make you say "where have you been all my life?" ü§Ø

discover.title: Car Events
discover.description: From Friday's meetup to the next Tokyo Auto Salon, you won't miss anything anymore! Discover events in your area and participate without having to stalk Facebook groups that never get updated.

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Get notifications about new events before your friends! No more 'oh but there was an event yesterday?' - you'll always be the first to know everything!

social.title: Crew & Community
social.description: Join existing crews or create your own! Perfect for those who want to make friends with other enthusiasts (and maybe find someone who lends you their GT-R for the weekend - dreaming doesn't cost anything üòÖ).

organize.title: Personal Garage
organize.description: Show the world your collection! Manage your cars, add photos, specs and customizations. And the best part? Apply for events in just a few taps! (Perfect for flexing) üí™

maps.title: Event Map
maps.description: The map that saves you from driving around the city randomly! Find nearby events, discover new places, and never miss a car meet again because 'you didn't know where it was'

calendar.title: Discover the Community
calendar.description: Explore incredible cars and customization styles that will make you say 'wow'! Perfect for getting inspiration (and for doing some healthy envy - it's normal, we all do it) üëÄ

organizers.title: For Organizers
organizers.subtitle: Are you an event organizer? Then this section is made just for you! Blinker is not just for participants, but also for those who create the magic of events! ‚ú®

management.title: Greater Visibility
management.description: Your events will reach thousands of enthusiasts! No more social media posts that get lost in the feed, here everyone will see your event and finally stop saying 'I didn't know it was happening' üìà

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Find out how many people saw your event, who was interested and who actually participated! Data that will help you improve more and more and brag with numbers! üìä

communication.title: Effective Communication
communication.description: Publish news, updates and changes in real time! All participants will receive instant notifications, no more WhatsApp groups exploding with 500 messages üì¢

ticketing.title: Selection Management
ticketing.description: Limited capacity events? Manage participation requests directly from the app! Approve, reject or keep on waiting list with a few taps and finally you can say 'no' without feeling guilty ‚úÖ

cta.title: Ready to revolutionize your events? üöÄ
cta.description: Join the organizers who have already chosen Blinker for their events!, you don't want to be left out, do you?

whyBlinker.title: Why Blinker? ü§î
whyBlinker.subtitle: Blinker was born from the frustration of always missing the best car meets! üòÖ
whyBlinker.description: We are a team of enthusiasts who said "enough is enough" and created the app we were all waiting for. Because we're tired of hearing "oh but there was an event yesterday?"

mapFilter.title: Filter events from the map
mapFilter.description: Search only for the type of event that interests you, and don't miss anything! üéØ

modernApp.title: Modern and Simple App
modernApp.description: Interface so intuitive that even your grandmother could use it!

followEvents.title: Follow the events that interest you
followEvents.description: You'll receive all updates from organizers in real time üì±

download.title: Download Blinker
download.subtitle: Join the car lovers community and never miss an event again

newsletter.title: Subscribe and Stay updated on news (it's Free!)
newsletter.subtitle: Enter your details to subscribe to the newsletter to receive the latest news about app updates and new automotive events, we promise you'll never receive spam from us!
newsletter.consentRequired: You must accept the privacy policy
newsletter.consentText: I accept to receive promotional communications. I can revoke consent at any time. For more information consult the

footer.description: The only app that saves you from automotive FOMO
footer.copyright: Made for car lovers, by people who can't afford a GT-R (yet).

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for the website to function

beta.title: Join Blinker Beta
beta.subtitle: Be among the first to test the app that will revolutionize the car meet world! üèéÔ∏è

success.title: üéâ You're in!
success.description: We've added you to the beta list. We'll contact you soon with download instructions!

beta.consentRequired: You must accept the privacy policy
beta.consentText: I accept to receive promotional communications. I can revoke consent at any time. For more information consult the
beta.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This is a beta version. There might be bugs, crashes and moments of 'why isn't this working?' üòÖ

first.title: First Access
first.description: You'll be among the first to test new features before they reach everyone else!

second.title: Influence Development
second.description: Your opinions and feedback will help shape the perfect app for car lovers!

third.title: Exclusive Status
third.description: You'll get a special 'Beta Tester' status and can brag to your friends! üòé

fourth.title: Bug Hunter
fourth.description: Find bugs and get special recognition. Become a community legend!

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Blinker ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our mobile app and related services.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller of your personal data is:

dataCollected.title: 3. Personal Data Collected
dataCollected.content: We collect different types of personal information:

purposes.title: 4. Processing Purposes
purposes.content: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
purposes: Service Provision: To provide and maintain our services, including automotive event management
Communication: To communicate with you regarding events, updates, and support
Improvement: To analyze usage and improve our services
Marketing: To send promotional communications (only with your consent)
Legal Compliance: To comply with legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data on the basis of:
bases: Consent: For marketing and non-essential cookies
Contract Performance: To provide our services
Legitimate Interest: To improve services and security
Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable regulations

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data with:
parties: Service Providers: Who help us provide our services
Event Partners: For specific events (only with your consent)
Business Transfers: In case of merger or acquisition

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for the time necessary to:
retention.deletion: Data is deleted or anonymized when no longer necessary.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
userRights: Access: Obtain a copy of your personal data
Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
Erasure: Request deletion of your data
Restriction: Limit processing in certain circumstances
Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
Objection: Object to processing for marketing
Consent Withdrawal: Withdraw consent at any time

security.title: 9. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data, including:
measures: Data encryption in transit and at rest

cookies.title: 10. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies for:
cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our consent banner.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred and processed in countries outside the EU/EEA. In these cases, we ensure that:
guarantees: The destination country offers adequate protection
Appropriate contractual safeguards are in place
The transfer is authorized by competent authorities

minors.title: 12. Minors
minors.content: Our services are not intended for minors under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors under 16 years of age. If we discover we have collected data from a minor, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: 13. Privacy Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via:
changes.review: We encourage you to regularly review this policy.

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or the processing of your personal data, contact us:
contact.complaint: You also have the right to file a complaint with the Data Protection Authority.

footer.gdprCompliance: This Privacy Policy complies with GDPR and European data protection regulations.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. These files contain information that helps the site remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They include cookies for:

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to collect information about how visitors use our site:

management.title: How to Manage Cookies
management.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Here's how:

chrome.title: Chrome
steps: Open Chrome and go to Settings

firefox.title: Firefox
steps: Open Firefox and go to Options
In the "Cookies and Site Data" section, manage settings
You can block all cookies or only third-party ones

safari.title: Safari
steps: Open Safari and go to Preferences
You can block all cookies or only third-party ones

edge.title: Edge
steps: Open Edge and go to Settings
You can block all cookies or only third-party ones

duration.title: Cookie Duration
types: Session Cookies: Are deleted when you close the browser
Persistent Cookies: Remain on your device for a specific period
Analytics Cookies: Generally last 2 years (Google Analytics)
Marketing Cookies: Can last up to 2 years

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services that may set cookies:
services: Google Analytics: To analyze site usage
Google Fonts: To load site fonts
thirdParty.note: These services have their own cookie policies that we encourage you to review.

updates.title: Cookie Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be published on this page with a new update date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about this Cookie Policy, contact us:

footer.ePrivacyCompliance: This Cookie Policy complies with European cookie regulations and the ePrivacy directive.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using the Blinker app, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the app. These terms apply to all users of the app, including event organizers and participants.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Blinker is a mobile application that facilitates the organization and participation in automotive events. Our services include:
services: Creation and management of automotive events
Sharing photos and content related to events

accountCreation.title: Account Creation
accountCreation.content: To use some app features, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.

accurateInfo.title: Accurate Information
accurateInfo.content: You commit to providing accurate, complete, and up-to-date information during registration and app usage.

accountResponsibility.title: Account Responsibility
accountResponsibility.content: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Notify immediately any unauthorized use.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You commit to using the app only for legitimate purposes and in compliance with these terms. It is prohibited to:
prohibited: Use the app for illegal or fraudulent activities
Upload offensive, defamatory, or inappropriate content
Unauthorized access to systems or accounts
Collect personal data of other users without consent

userContent.title: 5. User Content
userContent.content: When you upload content to the app:
rights: You retain ownership of your content
You grant us a non-exclusive license to use the content
You are responsible for the legality and appropriateness of content
We may remove content that violates these terms

privacy.title: 6. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: The processing of your personal data is regulated by our Privacy Policy, which forms an integral part of these terms. By using the app, you accept the processing of your data according to the Privacy Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The app and all its content (except user content) are protected by intellectual property rights. It is not permitted to:
prohibited: Copy, modify, or distribute the software

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Within the limits allowed by law, Blinker will not be liable for:
exclusions: Actions of third parties or other users
Damages resulting from force majeure events
liability.limit: Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services in the previous 12 months.

indemnification.title: 9. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You commit to indemnify and hold harmless Blinker from any claim, damage, or expense resulting from:
claims: Content you upload to the app

termination.title: 10. Suspension and Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account in case of:
termination.effect: In case of termination, you will lose access to your data and content.

modifications.title: 11. Terms Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective from the date of publication. We will notify you of significant changes via:
modifications.acceptance: By continuing to use the app after changes, you accept the new terms.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by Italian law. Any dispute will be resolved by the courts of Rome, Italy, unless otherwise provided by mandatory law.

general.title: 13. General Provisions
provisions: If a provision is invalid, the others remain valid
Non-enforcement of a right does not constitute waiver
These terms constitute the complete agreement between the parties
We are not responsible for events outside our control

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us:

footer.legalCompliance: These Terms of Service comply with European and Italian digital services regulations.
